price: 69. Katakanlah, “Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang mengada-adakan kebohongan terhadap Allah tidak akan beruntung.”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ لَا يُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul inna alladhīna yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba lā yuf'liḥūna
